fields.headline: One Day in Europe
fields.bodyText: A fictitious European Champions League final in Moscow between Deportivo La Coruna of Santiago de Compostela and Galatasaray of Istanbul provides the background to Hannes Stohr's Spanish-German co-production, One Day in Europe, a slight but attractive portmanteau movie telling four stories set on the same day. In each case, someone totally uninterested in football gets involved with the cops while everyone else's attention is concentrated on the championship match. An Englishwoman in Moscow and a Hungarian pilgrim in Santiago are robbed, while a German student in Istabul and a pair of itinerant French clowns in Berlin fake robberies to get insurance money. It's well observed, beautifully photographed and all rather predictable.
